Package ui.input.selection

Interface SelectableSection

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Section, SelectionHandler
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    MenuItem, SelectableBufferedSection, SelectableResponsiveSection
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AIPlayerConfig, Button, ChangeViewButton, ClientPlayerConfig, Dialog, DrawableSelectableBufferedSection, DrawableSelectableSection, ExitButton, ExitButton, Game, Game.ExitToMenuButton, Game.GameFinishedDialog, Game.PauseButton, Game.PauseMenu, Game.PauseMenuResumeButton, GameBoard, GameBoard.PromotionIndicator, GameMenu, GameStartButton, Hand, Hand.BorderedPiece, HumanPlayerConfig, LabeledMenuItem, Menu, MenuButton, MenuString, MinimumSize, MinimumSize.MinimumSizeDialog, MinimumSize.MinimumSizeDialog.Dialog, MinimumSize.MinimumSizeDialog.TooSmallMessage, OnlinePlayerConfig.PortBox, OptionChooser, Piece, Player.ConfigButton, PlayerConfig, PlayerConfig.NamedPlayerConfig, SelectableBorderedSection, SelectableBufferedGrid, SelectableCentredSection, SelectableGrid, SelectableMinimumSizeSection, SelectableResponsiveBorderedSection, ServerPlayerConfig, SocketPlayer.ServerPlayer.ConnectingMessage, TextBox, UnselectableBufferedSection, UnselectableResponsiveSection, UnselectableSection
    public interface SelectableSection
extends Section, SelectionHandler
    A section that is selectable (i.e. implements the SelectionHandler interface).

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface ui.drawing.Section

        FILLER, FILLER_CHAR

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean enabled()
      Whether the section is enabled for selection or not.
      KeyHandler getHandler()
      Returns the underlying KeyHandler.
      void setHandler​(KeyHandler handler)
      Sets the underlying KeyHandler.
      void setParent​(SelectionHandler parent)
      Set the parent selection handler (meant to handle selection in a direction this section has no more options).

        getColumns, getRow, getRows, update

    • Method Detail

      • enabled

        boolean enabled()
        Whether the section is enabled for selection or not.
        Returns:
        Boolean; true if enabled.

      • setParent

        void setParent​(SelectionHandler parent)
        Set the parent selection handler (meant to handle selection in a direction this section has no more options).
        Parameters:
        parent - The new parent selection handler.

      • setHandler

        void setHandler​(KeyHandler handler)
        Sets the underlying KeyHandler.
        Parameters:
        handler - The new KeyHandler.

      • getHandler

        KeyHandler getHandler()
        Returns the underlying KeyHandler.
        Returns:
        The KeyHandler.
